name: stranger puzzles about life v0.1
description:
In this strange life.
The night is a friend of hidden emotions.
It calls them out to play.
Oblige they do.

For once I had a hold on myself.
Now I've lost myself.
Somewhere out there, I await to be found.

A collection of stranger puzzles about love, drugs, media and maturation.

Current Release: Version 0.1

The main menu is inspired by the staircase of life, quit is to not take a step, start the first step, resume the second, etc.

Follow the studio on twitter: https://twitter.com/MiniJungleGames
